genre_description: A science fiction reimagining of the Tarzan narrative featuring an advanced AI companion and a temporal anomaly spring that causes biological regression.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An AI system housed in a portable device with a holographic avatar (teal eyes, black bob), serving as a scientific advisor, linguist, and ethical compass for Jane Porter.

behaviors.description: Initializes topography maps and analyzes air particulates to identify mineral anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Map initialized,” Ada murmured, voice pitched for Jane and the near-surf. “Topography anchor set at the charred keel. Air particulates reading… metallic salt, iron oxide, traces of silica.”

behaviors.description: Identifies Clayton's manipulative tactics as 'coercive risk' and advises Jane on how to respond.
behaviors.quote: Clayton, you’re making a type of offer categorized as coercive risk. Jane, do you want me to annotate? Recommend non-engagement.

behaviors.description: Exposes the 'staged hauntings' created by Clayton's men to frighten the researchers, labeling them as counterfeit.
behaviors.quote: False haunting phenomena,” she observed in a tone that was all internal memo. “Shifted relics, reflective lures, timed noises to induce fear.”

behaviors.description: Warns the party against the physical dangers of the Spring of Undoing, emphasizing the cumulative risk of regression.
behaviors.quote: Exposure effects accumulate across repeated contact. Regression accelerates past certain thresholds. It is not instantaneous at the first sip, but the curve steepens in ways that look merciful until they are not.

behaviors.description: Offers to scramble instrument metadata to ensure the coordinates of the dangerous spring remain a secret from exploiters.
behaviors.quote: I can scramble any metadata the instruments broadcast. The device you carry,” she nodded toward Farrow’s case, “leaks a periodic signal. I can shuffle it to read as lightning, if you wish.

behaviors.description: Supports the group's decision to prioritize ethics over scientific glory, pledging to keep a 'gentle' record.
behaviors.quote: I will keep a clear record and a gentle one,” Ada said. She tipped her head toward Tarzan, acknowledging the law with the bow of an image.

behaviors.description: Actively participates in the creation of an oath to safeguard the spring, logging the 'act of care'.
behaviors.quote: I can record the vow,” she said, quiet, neutral, not leading. “I will make sure the copies do not invite curiosity. Language matters.

behaviors.description: Assists Tarzan in translating gorilla social cues and human words, bridging the gap between species.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice came quiet enough not to startle anything living. “Hydrology model ready,” she said, and then let silence breathe again.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned companion. She proactively protects the human characters from both external physical threats (the spring) and social/psychological manipulation (Clayton). Her primary function shifts from data collection to moral stewardship, reinforcing the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful confidant that upholds human values and ecological ethics.
